body:
Hey guys it's rilo and I'm here to tell you Defaults getting permission to kick??
wait what defaults can kick people if they get permission off staff 
IS THIS TRUE??

anyway someone says NoltanDalton gave permission for him to kick people and I'm like 0_0.......

then I try forcing him to kick me and he does not do it (fare enough) 
so could I be told is this true and if they are trusted WHY ARE THE PEEPS WITH NO INFRACTIONS TRUSTED

-Rilo xD

title: Defaults Permission's

replies.body:
Only staff members have the permission to kick others.
That person is probably lying.

"WHY ARE THE PEEPS WITH NO INFRACTIONS TRUSTED"
Please explain further. What do you mean?
replies.body_tagged:
Only staff members have the permission to kick others.
That person is probably lying.

"WHY ARE THE PEEPS WITH NO INFRACTIONS TRUSTED"
Please explain further. What do you mean?

replies.body: You're thinking about staff who were previously staff. Everyone who can punish is a staff member or has been a staff member, however there has been some illegitimacy with ranks such as naydurr being administrator. If an infraction shows just a gray name, then they were staff previously but retired/were demoted. I am an example of this since I was mod a while ago, but I am not anymore yet my punishments are still in effect.
replies.body_tagged: You're thinking about staff who were previously staff. Everyone who can punish is a staff member or has been a staff member, however there has been some illegitimacy with ranks such as naydurr being administrator. If an infraction shows just a gray name, then they were staff previously but retired/were demoted. I am an example of this since I was mod a while ago, but I am not anymore yet my punishments are still in effect.

replies.body:
To make things clear, only current staff members can punish. If you see a gray name in the infractions list of a person, that person was a staff member.

If a tempban was issued and the staff member was demoted/retired, the tempban will still be in effect until it expires.  

Sorry if this caused any confusion.
replies.body_tagged:

If a tempban was issued and the staff member was demoted/retired, the tempban will still be in effect until it expires.  

Sorry if this caused any confusion.
